text: @bellacaledonia Is this to relaunch her Father as a senior member of the Royal Family-in the hopes the FBI will have forgotten about the other matter by then? Presumably this will be part of the Festival of Britain celebrations. To celebrate the end of COVID-19 and the beginning of Brexit? 🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️
